name: ostd::sync::wait::Waiter::wait_until_or_cancelled
src:
pub fn wait_until_or_cancelled<F, R, FCancel, E>(
        &self,
        mut cond: F,
        cancel_cond: FCancel,
    ) -> core::result::Result<R, E>
    where
        F: FnMut() -> Option<R>,
        FCancel: Fn() -> core::result::Result<(), E>,
